Text: A wonderful day of RNA at the NYC RNA Symposium. I delivered a talk on functions of mRNA in the cytoplasm.
The FXR1 network story is accepted to be published at Cell!
I attended and delivered a talk at the 2024 RNA society meeting in Edinburgh!
I updated the revised version of the FXR1 story.
I participated in and spoke at the Geoffrey Beene Cancer Research Center Annual Retreat!
I participated in and spoke at the 2022 Marie-Josee Kravis Women in Science Endeavor Symposium.
I was awarded the Kravis WiSE Postdoctoral Fellowship.
